name: GMTK2020Submission
description:
This Game is my submission to the GameMakers ToolKit Gamejam 2020.
The Goal was to design and create a Game in 48 Hours based on a Theme.
Music and most Artwork is from the Unity Asset Store, while the Code was done by myselfe. All used Assets are linked below.
I hope you'll like the game, and I'll be more than happy if you could give some Feedback.

If you also competed in the GMTK GameJam, leave a link to your game in the feedback and I'll check it out.

Sunnyland

Free Button Set

Music Tracks
